author: Paul Cullen
title: Coronavirus: Irish death rate from Covid-19 rises to 2.4% of cases
description: Overall rate likely to be lower when undiagnosed cases are eventually calculated
content:
The death rate from Covid-19 in the State has risen to 2.4 per cent, a new report shows, as the disease takes a further toll on vulnerable groups.
Of the 2,677 laboratory confirmed cases of the virus, 64 had died by last Monday, giving a case fatality rate o… [+1365 chars]
